name: An Infinite Calm
description:
An Infinite Calm is a relaxing trip across an everlasting and colorful ocean. Clear islands by rolling your cube to match colored tiles. You will uncover surprises along the way towards a calmer and chill mindset. Created for players to enjoy calming puzzles and retreat into a beautiful minimalist world.

Featuring:
• Simple tile matching gameplay that is easy to learn.
• Endless islands to complete - built to generate millions of unique layouts and color combinations.
• Colorful minimalist visuals that constantly change as you play.
• Hidden secrets to discover along the journey.
• A calming and otherworldly synth soundtrack by Cliffdiver.
